!Chamberlain Alfred: The Varka Silenos and Ketra Orcs are the chief problem at the moment, but if their power could be reduced, I think we could contain them. Fortunately, they are fairly equally matched right now. But if one side becomes weaker, their fight could turn into an all-out war.
